mainText:
My sincere condolences to the family, friends and collegues of Steve Jobs.
My Name is Monica T Santos. I live in Brazil, and started my career in 
System Analysis using the first computer Steve and Apple built, back in 
the 80's. Since then, Apple and specially Jobs have conquered, not only 
a customer, but a faithful fan.
Steve Jobs was Unique. A man ahead of his time, An example of 
creativity, geniality and open mind to the new and the unusual. An 
example and an inspiration.
May he rest in peace, from his last battle. May he never be forgotten! 
He will never be forgotten!!
author: Monica
